2021-10-10T13:53:42Z: We'll see you in a couple of weeks' time for the US Grand Prix at the Circuit of the Americas. Bring your stetsons, and we'll see y'all then!
2021-10-10T13:52:36Z: And here's the report from the Turkish Grand Prix! https://www.autosport.com/f1/news/f1-turkish-gp-bottas-dominates-ahead-of-verstappen/6684480/
2021-10-10T13:41:11Z: Ocon was the only driver to no-stop in the end, setting a 1m37s lap on the final tour - nearly 5s slower than Giovinazzi behind.
2021-10-10T13:36:22Z: Gasly, Norris, Sainz, Stroll and Ocon complete the top 10.
2021-10-10T13:36:07Z: Leclerc converts his second-row start into fourth, as Hamilton holds onto fifth.
2021-10-10T13:35:39Z: Verstappen finishes second, 14.5s adrift, as Perez completes the race in third.
2021-10-10T13:35:15Z: Valtteri Bottas wins the Turkish Grand Prix - and sets a 1m30.432s as he crosses the line!
2021-10-10T13:34:26Z: Both Alfa Romeos do catch Ricciardo late on - Giovinazzi getting by at the start of the final lap and quickly followed through by Raikkonen - to see the McLaren driver pushed back to 13th place.
2021-10-10T13:34:31Z: Bottas is on the final lap, and is going to try and cement the fastest lap point...
2021-10-10T13:33:45Z: Leclerc got out of the graining phase as Hamilton went into it,  with their gap now at a seemingly-insurmountable 4.6s.
2021-10-10T13:32:57Z: Ricciardo, who pitted way earlier than the rest, is now defending from the Alfa Romeo duo to keep hold of 11th place. Further back, Schumacher has got ahead of team-mate Mazepin for P19.
2021-10-10T13:32:13Z: Bottas out front now sets a 1m31.023s, opening the lead over Verstappen to 10 seconds with two laps left.
2021-10-10T13:29:26Z: Gasly's now coming at Hamilton, as the Mercedes driver hits the graining stage on those inters.
2021-10-10T13:29:04Z: And there Stroll goes up the inside at Turn 1 to take ninth place from Ocon, and he now has 5.6s to defend for three laps against Ricciardo behind him to stay in the points.
2021-10-10T13:26:42Z: Hamilton is now less effusive about having to stop, having realised he's lost places to Perez and Leclerc. Leclerc, however, is haemorrhaging time to the Mercedes driver now.
2021-10-10T13:25:59Z: Ocon is the last driver standing when it comes to not pitting in this race. The Alpine is on a supreme eco-drive when it comes to tyre life but he's about to lose ninth place to Stroll behind him.
2021-10-10T13:25:18Z: That elevates Leclerc into third, but not for long as Perez dives past at Turn 12!
2021-10-10T13:24:15Z: Mercedes, however, decides to make the stop and Hamilton complies as they want to pit him into the slot ahead of Gasly.
2021-10-10T13:19:56Z: Sainz is still on a charge, having been held up by his slow pitstop, as he puts in a new fastest lap of the race of 1m32.597s. He has 14.7s to gain to catch Norris ahead of him in the space of the last 10 laps.
2021-10-10T13:19:45Z: Leclerc rejoins in fourth for now, and will hope to hold off Perez as he warms up his tyres.
2021-10-10T13:19:00Z: Leclerc concedes defeat and stops from second place, but won't risk it and takes on fresh inters.
2021-10-10T13:18:15Z: Meanwhile, a more comprehensive dry line is starting to form, giving Mercedes food for thought about what to do with Hamilton.
2021-10-10T13:17:16Z: Bottas now gets a run on Leclerc out of the final corner, getting the inside and reclaims the lead!
2021-10-10T13:16:30Z: After a couple of laps behind Ocon, Sainz makes his move charging up the inside into Turn 1 and gets ahead to take eighth place.
2021-10-10T13:14:27Z: Verstappen reports his steering wheel is starting to go left-hand down, while Leclerc has a lock-up at Turn 12 and invites Bottas to come even closer - the gap just 1.2s now.
2021-10-10T13:12:58Z: Leclerc's had a bit of a slow lap last time around, giving Bottas the ammo to cut the gap to three seconds.
2021-10-10T13:11:06Z: Behind non-pitters Leclerc and Hamilton, Ocon is the only other driver yet to opt for fresh tyres. Ocon is P8 but has Sainz right behind him.
2021-10-10T13:07:05Z: Gasly stopped from fifth and served his five-second penalty before taking on new intermediates.
2021-10-10T13:06:05Z: Vettel duly pits at the end of the lap, sliding into a half-spin at pit entry, and was a whole minute slower compared to the rest. Vettel is now P18 and well out of it.
2021-10-10T13:06:10Z: Bottas has managed to fire up his inters quicker than Verstappen, adding to his buffer. Leclerc has yet to stop and sits in the lead.
2021-10-10T13:05:00Z: Perez also makes a stop, allowing Hamilton to make up a place - and the Mercedes driver now sits on Verstappen's tail having not stopped.
2021-10-10T13:03:45Z: Vettel has gambled to pit for the medium tyres and it is a gamble that has failed. On his out-lap he's been off at Turn 4 and Turn 7 and is being overtaken by everyone.
2021-10-10T13:02:24Z: After all that good work in the first stint climbing up the order, Sainz has an awful pitstop, stationary for 8s. He's stuck to the inters.
2021-10-10T13:02:31Z: Bottas reacts to Verstappen's pitlane visit by coming into the pits himself.
2021-10-10T13:00:54Z: Verstappen is the first of the leaders to blink, pitting for fresh intermediate tyres. The cat is very much amongst the pigeons.
2021-10-10T13:00:28Z: Latifi the latest to pit, followed a lap later by Tsunoda and Russell, all opting for fresh inters.
2021-10-10T12:58:42Z: Norris pits for fresh inters and comes out in ninth place, dropping behind Stroll and Sainz.
2021-10-10T12:58:59Z: Hamilton finally gets a run on Perez, and hangs around the outside of Turn 12 to try and get the inside - but Perez SOMEHOW defends from Hamilton in the following corners and remains fourth!
2021-10-10T12:57:05Z: An overtake - not had one of those for a while - as Ricciardo gets by Latifi into Turn 1 on lap 33.
2021-10-10T12:55:07Z: Bottas says his rear is getting a little snappy, so has been asked to get some heat into them by avoiding the wet bits of the circuit. Regardless, he's now leaving Verstappen very much behind at his point.
2021-10-10T12:53:22Z: Alonso becomes the second driver to pit in this race. The Alpine driver serves his penalty for the clash with Schumacher before getting a new set of inters and returns in P18.
2021-10-10T12:51:25Z: Ocon is all over the rear of Vettel in the fight for 10th place but cannot find a way through at the Turn 12-14 complex.
2021-10-10T12:49:29Z: Mazepin holds Hamilton up a fair bit despite blue flags - luckily for the British driver, Perez ahead had a slow lap in the 1m35s.
2021-10-10T12:48:20Z: At half-race distance it is still only Ricciardo that has pitted in this race. The track appears to be drying out, but really slowly.
2021-10-10T12:45:27Z: Ricciardo aside, the pace of the entire field has dipped slightly. Is it the tyres wearing or is it the rain returning? Or could it even be strategy and tyre preservation in play?
2021-10-10T12:44:21Z: The pace among the leaders has also dropped into the 1m34s, although Perez has picked up the pace to re-open the gap to Hamilton to 3s.
2021-10-10T12:43:22Z: The new intermediate tyres are still getting into the right performance window for Ricciardo. The McLaren driver is currently lapping in the mid 1m34s - around the same pace as team-mate Norris.
2021-10-10T12:40:57Z: Leclerc now has the fastest lap, finding some pace in that Ferrari, and picks up a 1m32.981s to close in on the lead battle.
2021-10-10T12:40:01Z: Tsunoda has spun at Turn 9 which drops the AlphaTauri driver down to P13. Having been fighting for the points that's a disaster for the F1 rookie.
2021-10-10T12:38:29Z: And McLaren duly pits Ricciardo to see him rejoin in P18. All eyes on his pace for the rest of the pack now.
2021-10-10T12:36:52Z: Hamilton reclaims the fastest lap, a 1m33.019s, as he's 3.3s behind Perez now.
2021-10-10T12:34:38Z: Bottas gets a slide at Turn 1, and an iffy lap helps Verstappen find half a second on the leader at the end of lap 19.
2021-10-10T12:33:39Z: A smoother Sainz gets by Tsunoda under braking for Turn 12 to move up to ninth place. That Ferrari has way more grip than its rivals  and is lapping as fast as the leaders.
2021-10-10T12:32:26Z: Bottas responds a lap later, logging a 1m33.146s to outpace the Red Bull.
2021-10-10T12:31:53Z: Verstappen sets a 1m33.282s, the fastest lap so far.
2021-10-10T12:31:20Z: Hamilton asks if anyone else is complaining about tyres - Bono tells him that he's okay on that front compared to others.
2021-10-10T12:30:46Z: Verstappen's now closing on Bottas, as the Mercedes driver is wearing through those inters at a faster rate. Gasly is told Norris behind him is suffering the same thing.
2021-10-10T12:27:43Z: That Sainz on Vettel clash was quickly noted and then deemed not worth an investigation. Ref says play on.
2021-10-10T12:26:59Z: Hamilton sails past Gasly on the back straight to move up to fifth. Perez is next up, 8s ahead.
2021-10-10T12:26:35Z: Ah, not much smooth operating by Sainz there. The Spanish driver gets by Vettel at Turn 12 but braking to the inside line of Vettel he understeers into the Aston Martin.
2021-10-10T12:25:00Z: Ricciardo and Alonso aren't finding progress up through the pack quite so easy as smooth operator Sainz. The Ferrari driver is P11 all over the rear of Vettel, while Ricciardo is still stuck behind Russell in P16 with Alonso right behind him.
2021-10-10T12:22:11Z: Now it's a 1m33.450s for Hamilton as he attempts to close up the gap to Gasly.
2021-10-10T12:20:58Z: Hamilton subsequently sets the fastest lap, a 1m34.206s, after passing Norris.
2021-10-10T12:20:09Z: On lap 10 Hamilton dives up the inside of Norris at Turn 9 to take sixth place. Gasly is up next for the Mercedes driver.
2021-10-10T12:19:21Z: As expected, Alonso is given a 5-second time penalty for punting off Schumacher earlier in the race. So a penalty each for Gasly and Alonso which will be served during the pitstops.
2021-10-10T12:18:06Z: A lap after getting by Tsunoda, Hamilton makes quick work of passing Stroll for P7.
2021-10-10T12:17:21Z: Sainz is rapid right now, he is already up to P11 having passed Giovinazzi and Ocon. That's nine places in nine laps!
2021-10-10T12:17:33Z: It's a 5-second penalty for Pierre Gasly for that T1 contact with Alonso.
2021-10-10T12:17:11Z: Bottas has extended his lead to 2.1s over Verstappen now, as the Red Bull driver is now closer to Leclerc behind him than the leader.
2021-10-10T12:16:12Z: Smooth move by Hamilton, as he gets by Tsunoda around the outside at Turn 4 on lap 8. The Mercedes driver is now P8.
2021-10-10T12:14:26Z: Sainz, having started P19 due to his power unit change, is up to P13 having got by Russell and Raikkonen in consecutive laps. Fellow back-row starter Ricciardo is P16 behind Russell.
2021-10-10T12:13:13Z: The Alonso on Schumacher clash has now been put under investigation. Regardless of any assumed bias, that looks a fairly straightforward penalty coming for Alonso.
2021-10-10T12:11:45Z: Five laps into the race and Hamilton is still stuck behind Tsunoda in ninth place and hasn't shown too many moves on the Japanese rider yet. A long race ahead for Hamilton as it stands.
2021-10-10T12:11:21Z: Verstappen's got some issues with his gearshifts, and is asked to stand by as Red Bull has a look at it.
2021-10-10T12:10:48Z: The Gasly/Alonso incident is under investigation.
2021-10-10T12:09:41Z: The incident involving Schumacher has been noted by race control. Replays show Alonso gave him a big old biff and punted him off the track.
2021-10-10T12:08:35Z: It's a 1m34.359s for Bottas, extending his lead over Verstappen.
2021-10-10T12:07:03Z: On the second lap at Turn 4 Schumacher is the latest to spin but avoids any major issue and rejoins in 19th place, only ahead of fellow spinner Latifi.
2021-10-10T12:07:11Z: Bottas is making hay while the sun, uh...shines? He's got over a second on Verstappen, with Leclerc a further 1.7s back on the Red Bull.
2021-10-10T12:06:09Z: Hamilton gets by Vettel to take ninth at the end of the opening lap, while further back Latifi has spun off and dropped to last place.
2021-10-10T12:06:03Z: Perez has moved up to fourth, ahead of Gasly and Norris.
2021-10-10T12:05:01Z: Hamilton makes a steady start moving up to 10th place after Alonso’s Turn 1 spin. Alonso has slotted into P17 now, ahead of Sainz, Ricciardo and Mazpein.
2021-10-10T12:05:03Z: Bottas leads away from Verstappen - as Alonso spins at Turn 1!
2021-10-10T12:04:30Z: Lights out - the Turkish Grand Prix begins!
